file_content.text: If it isn't my favorite strike team. Tell me you found the Ulgo pain factory.
They've got quite a setup. Looks like the Ulgos were here awhile.
This is the place.
They were torturing Killiks. I didn't expect this smell, the sights... it's gruesome.
It's absolutely horrifying.
Don't empathize too much. The important thing is, no more Killik frenzies.
Dead Ulgos, dead Killiks, dead Joiners... I'd say I found it.
I'm knee-deep in bodies.
Fantastic. Wish I could've come along, but I know my limitations.
Ulgo's going to have a hard time riling up the Killiks now. Gives us breathing room.
Of course, it'd be a shame to let all that tech go to waste. Bet Ulgo learned a few things about the bugs.
The Killiks are living creatures. There's nothing to learn from this sort of brutality.
Those "bugs" deserve sympathy.
The Killiks are animals. Smart, but... not that smart.
Glad you're paying attention, "Science Commander."
Always a researcher, huh?
I might be able to replicate the Ulgo experiments, bring the Killiks onto our side. See if you can salvage the data and equipment.
Sorry, but I can't let someone else torture a sentient life-form.
I won't let you recreate this.
You don't think of anyone but yourself. Fine.
I'll do what I can. Hope you get some use out of this.
Uploading data now.
If we can't turn the Killiks, I'll at least grab the combat routines off the torture droids. Might help us play defense.
You should get out of there. Meet me at the command post for a debrief.
What are you suggesting?
